My grandma's parrot likes cornflakes.
Roadworks in Cracow will be finished in time.
In a month from today will be nice weather.
In two months from today will be raining.
During the year, the price of white bread will be lower.
There will be a car crash on a Kr√≥lewska street in Cracow tomorrow.
Tomorrow there will not be a bank robery in New York.
There is an intelligent life in our galaxy (excluding the Earth).
This game creator likes strawberry ice.
